entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 38. Wind chill minus 56 this evening and minus 51 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
